content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″]

[vc_single_image image=”11277″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”iOS Development Services” font_container=”tag:h3|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_column_text]Mobile applications for iPhone and iPad take up a large part of all Appitron Solutions 350+ mobile projects. While rendering iOS app development services over the course of 5 years, we have gained wealth of expertise, apparent from our hallmark projects across multiple industries.

Our iOS IPTV apps serve such media market leaders as MTV, BBC, Fox Entertainment, T-Mobile and Orange. One of the mobile banking solutions we developed received a gold award at a mobile banking contest in 2017 and 2020, while another our banking app received praise from Deloitte[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1606730902510{background-color: #e4e4e4 !important;}” el_class=”ios-service-sec”][vc_column]

iPhone App Development Services

Custom apps for a range of iOS devices, including iPad, Apple Watch and iPhone app development.
[vc_row_inner el_class=”first”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1493875964566{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

iPhone UI/UX Design

Our UI/UX services take an iterative approach to create beautiful digital experiences specifically to enhance experience on iPhone.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1493819054764{padding: 0px !important;}”]

Custom iOS App Development Services

We build user-centric iPhone applications with the right tools for the development of your app according to your needs for growth.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1493876017970{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

iPhone App Integration

Seamless iPhone integration services to enhance functionality of applications based on latest technology trends for optimum results.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner el_class=”first”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1493875964566{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

iPhone Support & Maintenance

Appitron Software offers comprehensive iPhone app maintenance which involves monitoring user performance and optimizing app performance.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1493819054764{padding: 0px !important;}”]

iPhone App Testing

iPhone app testing services to ensure that mobile applications are bugs and glitches free and offer best user experience consistently.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1493876017970{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”]

iPhone App Upgrade

iPhone app upgrade to incorporate new features and ensure app’s compatibility with latest versions of iPhone and Apple iOS features.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”10/12″]

UI/UX DESIGN

When it comes to visual design, Appitron Solutions is always on the same page with Apple, so it’s easy for us to meet their expectations. With UIKit, our mobile app designers create every app’s interface in compliance with Apple’s UI standards
[vc_single_image image=”11291″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
